about.title: About Orymart
about.description: Orymart is a leading global marketplace connecting millions of buyers and sellers worldwide. We provide a platform for businesses of all sizes to reach customers globally.
about.missionText: To empower businesses and individuals to thrive in the digital economy by providing world-class e-commerce solutions.
about.value1: Customer satisfaction is our top priority
about.value3: Trust and security in every transaction

help.title: Help Center
help.shippingAnswer: Standard shipping takes 3-7 business days. Express shipping takes 1-3 business days.
help.returnsAnswer: We offer 30-day returns on most items. Items must be in original condition.
help.payment: What payment methods do you accept?
help.paymentAnswer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.

careers.title: Join Our Team
careers.subtitle: Build the future of e-commerce with us
careers.engineeringDesc: Build scalable systems that serve millions of users worldwide.
careers.designDesc: Create beautiful and intuitive user experiences.
careers.marketingDesc: Help grow our brand and reach new customers.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.acceptanceText: By accessing and using this website, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.
terms.useOfSiteText: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. You agree not to use the site in any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation.
terms.privacyText: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy, which also governs your use of the Site.
terms.limitationText: In no event shall Orymart be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.collectionText: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.
privacy.usage1: To provide and maintain our services
privacy.usage2: To process transactions and send related information
privacy.usage3: To send you technical notices and support messages
privacy.usage4: To communicate with you about products, services, and events
privacy.sharingText: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy.
privacy.securityText: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

settings.manageAccount: Manage your account preferences and settings

settings.addNewPaymentMethodToast: Add new payment method functionality would open a form
settings.chooseHowNotified: Choose how you want to be notified
settings.orderUpdatesDesc: Get notified about your order status
settings.smsNotificationsDesc: Receive text messages for urgent updates

vendor.title: Become a Seller
vendor.subtitle: Join thousands of sellers worldwide
vendor.description: Start your online business journey with our comprehensive seller platform. Reach millions of customers globally and grow your business with our advanced tools and support.
vendor.globalReachDesc: Access millions of customers worldwide across 100+ countries
vendor.easySetupDesc: Get your store online in minutes with our simple setup process
vendor.powerfulToolsDesc: Manage inventory, orders, and analytics with professional tools
vendor.24SupportDesc: Get help whenever you need it from our dedicated support team
vendor.formDescription: Complete the form below to start selling on our platform
vendor.taxIdPlaceholder: Enter your tax ID or registration number
vendor.businessDescPlaceholder: Describe your business and what you sell
vendor.zipCodePlaceholder: Enter your ZIP or postal code
vendor.sellingInformationDesc: Details about what you plan to sell
vendor.productCategoriesPlaceholder: What types of products will you sell?
vendor.agreeToTerms: I agree to the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
vendor.agreeToSelling: I agree to the Seller Agreement and understand the selling policies
vendor.confirmTaxCompliance: I confirm that I will comply with all applicable tax laws and regulations
vendor.accountDisclaimer: By creating an account, you agree to our terms and conditions. Your account will be reviewed and activated within 24-48 hours.
vendor.helpDescription: Our seller support team is here to help you get started
